Here's a simple MATLAB plot:

```{matlab}
x = 0:0.1:2*pi;
y = sin(x);
figure('Visible', 'off')  % Create invisible figure
plot(x,y)
title('Test MATLAB Plot')
print('-dpng', '-r300', 'testplot.png')  % Save explicitly as PNG
close(gcf)  % Close the figure
